modShortDescription: Eliminates most Tier 0 weapons and tools from loot, while giving a small chance to find low quality Tier 1 items at early gamestages.
modDescription:
Eliminates most Tier 0 weapons and [tools](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-tools/) from loot, while giving a small chance to find low quality Tier 1 items at early gamestages.

This mod works on servers with no client side installation necessary, or on single player games.

**[Download](https://imadeyoursite.com/7days/BModNoStoneAge.zip)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/24958-brians-mods-for-alpha-196/).

**Credits:** [Dhlmaster](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/dhlmaster/)
